arts.ttl: Steve Clarke explains 'the Scotland way' after clinching World Cup berth in Denmark thriller
arts.sum: Coach becomes first coach to take Tartan Army to three major tournaments

arts.ttl: Scotland sinner launches into most remarkable Hampden confession as Denmark goes potty
arts.sum: The defender was sent off for two bookings for fouls on John McGinn.

arts.ttl: Scotland edge out Denmark in six-goal epic to reach World Cup
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Scotland beat Denmark 4-2 to reach the men's World Cup finals for the first time since 1998.

arts.ttl: Wonder-goals for the World Cup as Scotland beat Denmark in Hampden Park tussle for the ages
arts.sum: Scotland qualify for their first World Cup Finals since 1998 with an epic 4-2 victory over Denmark at Hampden Park that featured three wonder-goals from Tartan Army players.

arts.ttl: Scotland qualify for World Cup after dramatic victory over Denmark
arts.sum: In added time Tierney fired in from 25 yards with McLean scoring from the halfway line.

arts.ttl: Scotland 4-2 Denmark: Tartan Army turn on the style to reach first World Cup since 1998
arts.sum: Scots confirm historic win with pair of injury-time stunners

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Scotland qualify for World Cup and end 28-year wait in dramatic Denmark win
arts.sum: Scotland faced Denmark in World Cup qualifying knowing a win would secure qualifcation and anything less would mean needing to qualify for the tournament in the United States via a play-off

arts.ttl: Scotland 4-2 Denmark: Match Highlights and Player Ratings
arts.sum: Steve Clarke's side were in action to try and earn a spot at the 2026 World Cup

arts.ttl: Premier League star in tears as he's taken off on a stretcher in Scotland's crucial World Cup qualifier against Denmark
arts.sum: The winger had started the game for Steve Clarke's side at Hampden Park, with the players knowing that a win would secure their place at the 2026 World Cup in North America.

arts.ttl: Stunning McTominay overhead kick gives Scotland lead over Denmark
arts.sum: Watch Scott McTominay's stunning overhead kick give Scotland an early lead in their decisive World Cup qualifier with Denmark.
